mapper.select: SELECT * FROM nurse WHERE nurse_name=#{nurseName,jdbcType=CHAR}
SELECT * FROM nurse WHERE nurse_id=#{nurseId,jdbcType=CHAR}
SELECT * FROM nurse WHERE nurse_id=#{nurseId,jdbcType=CHAR}
SELECT nurse.* FROM order_receiver,nurse WHERE order_nurseid = nurse_id AND order_ordersendid =#{0}

select
distinct
from nurse
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT nurse_id,nurse_header,nurse_mark,nurse_nick, @rownum := @rownum +1 AS ranks,nurse_createtime FROM nurse t, (SELECT@rownum :=0) r ORDER BY nurse_mark DESC,nurse_createtime ASC

SELECT nurse_id,nurse_header,nurse_mark,nurse_nick, @rownum := @rownum +1 AS ranks,nurse_createtime FROM nurse t, (SELECT@rownum :=0) r WHERE nurse_id = #{nurseId,jdbcType=CHAR} ORDER BY nurse_mark DESC,nurse_createtime ASC

SELECT a.nurse_id,a.nurse_header,a.nurse_nick, SUM( IFNULL(c.nurse_finish_order_nurse_signin,0) +IFNULL(b.signin_integral,0) )AS nurse_mark FROM nurse a LEFT JOIN nurse_finish_order_signin c ON a.nurse_id = c.nurse_finish_order_nurse_id AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= DATE(c.nurse_finish_order_createtime) LEFT JOIN nurse_signin b ON a.nurse_id = b.nurse_id AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= DATE(b.signin_time) GROUP BY a.nurse_id ORDER BY nurse_mark DESC,a.nurse_createtime ASC

SELECT a.nurse_id,a.nurse_header,a.nurse_nick, SUM( IFNULL(c.nurse_finish_order_nurse_signin,0) +IFNULL(b.signin_integral,0) )AS nurse_mark FROM nurse a LEFT JOIN nurse_finish_order_signin c ON a.nurse_id = c.nurse_finish_order_nurse_id AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= DATE(c.nurse_finish_order_createtime) LEFT JOIN nurse_signin b ON a.nurse_id = b.nurse_id AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= DATE(b.signin_time) WHERE a.nurse_id= #{nurseId,jdbcType=CHAR} GROUP BY a.nurse_id ORDER BY nurse_mark DESC,a.nurse_createtime ASC

SELECT a.nurse_id,a.nurse_header,a.nurse_nick, SUM( IFNULL(c.nurse_finish_order_nurse_signin,0) +IFNULL(b.signin_integral,0) )AS nurse_mark FROM nurse a LEFT JOIN nurse_finish_order_signin c ON a.nurse_id = c.nurse_finish_order_nurse_id AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= DATE(c.nurse_finish_order_createtime) LEFT JOIN nurse_signin b ON a.nurse_id = b.nurse_id AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= DATE(b.signin_time) GROUP BY a.nurse_id ORDER BY nurse_mark DESC,a.nurse_createtime ASC

SELECT a.nurse_id,a.nurse_header,a.nurse_nick, SUM( IFNULL(c.nurse_finish_order_nurse_signin,0) +IFNULL(b.signin_integral,0) )AS nurse_mark FROM nurse a LEFT JOIN nurse_finish_order_signin c ON a.nurse_id = c.nurse_finish_order_nurse_id AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= DATE(c.nurse_finish_order_createtime) LEFT JOIN nurse_signin b ON a.nurse_id = b.nurse_id AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= DATE(b.signin_time) WHERE a.nurse_id= #{nurseId,jdbcType=CHAR} GROUP BY a.nurse_id ORDER BY nurse_mark DESC,a.nurse_createtime ASC
SELECT nurse_id FROM nurse WHERE nurse_invitationcode=#{nurseInvitationcode,jdbcType=CHAR};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nurse;
SELECT COUNT(*), DATE_FORMAT(nurse_createtime,"%Y-%m-%d") FROM nurse WHERE DATE_FORMAT(nurse_createtime,"%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d");
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nurse WHERE DATE_FORMAT(nurse_createtime,"%X-%V") = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%X-%V");
SELECT COUNT(*), DATE_FORMAT(nurse_createtime,"%Y-%m") FROM nurse WHERE DATE_FORMAT(nurse_createtime,"%Y-%m") = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m");
SELECT *,COUNT(order_receive_id)AS orderCounts FROM nurse LEFT JOIN order_receiver ON nurse_id = order_nurseid GROUP BY nurse_id ORDER BY nurse_communicate ASC,orderCounts ASC LIMIT #{start}, #{rows}
SELECT * FROM nurse WHERE nurse_district=2 LIMIT #{start}, #{rows}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nurse WHERE nurse_district=2

nurse_nick like '%${_parameter}%'
OR
nurse_name like '%${_parameter}%'
OR
nurse_phone like '%${_parameter}%'
OR
nurse_invitationcode like '%${_parameter}%'
OR
nurse_job like '%${_parameter}%'
OR
nurse_number like '%${_parameter}%'
OR
nurse_yearsofservice like '%${_parameter}%'
OR
nurse_place like '%${_parameter}%'
OR
nurse_truename like '%${_parameter}%'
OR
nurse_card like '%${_parameter}%'
OR
nurse_province like '%${_parameter}%'

select * from nurse WHERE
nurse_nick like '%${_parameter}%'
OR
nurse_name like '%${_parameter}%'
OR
nurse_phone like '%${_parameter}%'
OR
nurse_invitationcode like '%${_parameter}%'
OR
nurse_job like '%${_parameter}%'
OR
nurse_number like '%${_parameter}%'
and nurse_district = '0'
SELECT * FROM nurse LEFT JOIN nurse_payment_settings ON nurse_id = nurse_payment_settings_nurse_id WHERE nurse_id = #{nurseId,jdbcType=CHAR}
SELECT * FROM nurse WHERE DATE_FORMAT(nurse_createtime,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')
SELECT * FROM nurse WHERE DATE_FORMAT(nurse_createtime,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')
